text: I decided to test it out yesterday for the first time, I couldn’t drag to resize the columns. didn’t know if I was doing something wrong though
<@UJL4N3WN8> lol, they were reported by my team, I DM'd more specific info to Coley, all repaired now

Modules with “make available in templates and pages” set to `false` are still showing up as options to add to the page in the lp editor. Only when I select “Add modules to layout”… not in the “edit modules view”
